rules_text:
Flying
When Sustainable Food Source leaves the battlefield, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{2}{W}, Pay 3 life: Return Sustainable Food Source from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
notes:
Changed art
1RW —> 1WW
Want to gauge the reactions to this in mono-W. There’s nothing here that white can’t do, really, and I think a one-off white phoenix isn’t really offensive.
